Title: Permits the office of village justice and/or associate justice may be held by a non-resident
Summary: Authorizes the board of trustees of the village of East Syracuse to permit that the office of village justice and/or associate justice may be held by a non-resident who lives in the town of Dewitt.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the board of trustees of the village of East Syracuse to permit that the office of village justice and/or associate justice may be held by a non-resident, provided that they reside in the town of Dewitt
